Description.Text: Livin Mykonos is a modern 4-star superior property offering stylish accommodation in Mykonos Town. Highlights include an outdoor swimming pool, onsite dining and a great beachfront location. Mykonos Town is the capital and largest settlement on the Greek island of Mykonos. The sun shines for up to 300 days a year and there is a thriving nightlife scene, making it one of the most popular tourist destinations in the Aegean. Places of interest include the famous Windmills of Mykonos, Little Venice, the Archaeological Museum of Mykonos and the Aegean Maritime Museum. The hotel is housed in a contemporary mid-rise building. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool, and free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Classic rooms are decorated in a comfortable style with wood furniture and marble floors. Amenities include air-conditioning, tea and coffee equipment, satellite TV, a mini-bar, safe, work desk and an en-suite bathroom. The hotel restaurant serves Greek specialities in a relaxed setting. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the bar, and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service.
